Original title: Blue Ruin (Blueruin)
Year: 2013
Duration: 91 min.
Country: United States

Starring: Macon Blair, Eve Plumb, Devin Ratray, Amy Hargreaves, David W. Thompson, Bonnie Johnson, Stacy Rock, Kevin Kolack
Studio: The Lab of Madness / Film Science / Neighborhood Watch
Genre: Thriller | Crime. Revenge. Neo-noir. Indie USA

Synopsis
Dwight is a bum quiet life, a thirty homeless living in his car, a blue Pontiac shabby. Wander around town and survives collecting bottles on the beach, until one day their routine is upset when he learned terrible news. This leads him to take a crazy decision and return to his childhood home to conduct a strange revenge.
